page.title: 19COMMUNICATIONS NASH AREA
page.content: The area comes under Milton Keynes for its postal services; Beachampton is in the postal area MK19, Nash is MK 17. There are 4 post boxes. On weekdays there are 2 collections and deliveries of mail, 1 on Saturday. Mail is taken to the main sorting office at Milton Keynes. Everyday postal requirements are met by the sub Post Office at Nash. Telephones are the responsibility of the Milton Keynes District, Bedford Division of British Telecom. The electronic exchange is at Milton Keynes, the STD code being 0908. There are 2 public telephones. These services have become centralised. Television services are supplied by ITV Anglia and BBC East; local radio - Independant Chiltern Radio and Hereward Radio; BBC Radio Northampton.
